target: I've been coming to enjoy the food in Roemah Nenek more times than I could remember. I love the comfortable atmosphere for dining with family. On certain days, there's even live music. The food also has a lot of variations, from the traditional, Asian, and even Western food.

target: Good service, large enough parking lot, the strawberry grove is vast and has a lot of red strawberries that's ripe for picking.
